TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySchedule extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別表示 Active Directory 網域服務複寫的每週排程。

span.span: The class represents the weekly schedule for an Active Directory Domain Services replication.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool[,,] RawSchedule { get; set; }
.property instance bool[,,] RawSchedule
Public Property RawSchedule As Boolean(,,)
public: property cli::array <bool, 3> ^ RawSchedule { cli::array <bool, 3> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <bool, 3> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定三維陣列，表示一週中來源可供複寫的時間為何。

span.span: Gets or sets a three-dimensional array that indicates at what time during the week that the source is available for replication.

Docs.value:
元素的三維陣列，如果在特定的 15 分鐘間隔期間可複寫來源，則此元素為 。A three-dimensional array of elements in which the element is if the source is available for replication during that specific 15-minute interval. 如果來源無法供複寫之用，則此元素為 。The element is if the source is not available for replication.
陣列是在表單 RawSchedule [<的週中日>，<小時>， <15 分鐘間隔>]。The array is in the form RawSchedule[<day-of-week>, <hour>, <15-minute interval>]. 這些值全都是以零起始，而且一週是從星期天凌晨 00:00 開始 (Coordinated Universal Time)。All of these values are zero-based and the week begins at 00:00 on Sunday morning, Coordinated Universal Time.
下列是有效的星期名稱值：The following are the valid values for the day-of-week.
一週的值 Day-of-week value
指定一週的星期幾。 Indicated day of the week.
0
0
Sunday Sunday
1
1
星期一 Monday
2
2
星期二 Tuesday
3
3
星期三 Wednesday
4
4
星期四 Thursday
5
5
星期五 Friday
6
6
星期六 Saturday
小時是以零起始，且以 24 小時格式指定。The hour is zero-based and specified in 24-hour format. 例如，下午 2For example, 2 P.M. 會指定為 14。would be specified as 14. 有效值為 0-23。Valid values are 0-23.
15 分鐘的間隔可指定在一個小時內可複寫來源的一段 15 分鐘時間。The 15-minute interval specifies the 15-minute block within the hour that the source is available for replication. 下表將識別 15 分鐘間隔的可能之值。The following table identifies the possible values for the 15-minute interval.
15 分鐘的間隔 15-minute interval
描述 Description
0
0
使用從 0 到 14 分鐘複寫來源。 The source is available for replication from 0 to 14 minutes after the hour.
1
1
適用於從 15 到 29 分鐘複寫來源。 The source is available for replication from 15 to 29 minutes after the hour.
2
2
適用於從 30 到 44 分鐘複寫來源。 The source is available for replication from 30 to 44 minutes after the hour.
3
3
適用於從 45 到 59 分鐘的複寫來源。 The source is available for replication from 45 to 59 minutes after the hour.
下列 C# 範例將示範如何使用這個屬性來判斷是否可以在 Coordinated Universal Time 星期二 15:50 時複寫來源。The following C# example shows how to use this property to determine if the source is available for replication at 15:50 Coordinated Universal Time on Tuesday.
```csharp Boolean isAvailable = scheduleObject.RawSchedule[2, 15, 3]; ```
下列 C# 範例將示範如何使用這個屬性來計算執行階段的 15 分鐘間隔，透過的方式是將分鐘除以 15。The following C# example shows how to use this property to calculate the 15-minute interval at runtime by dividing the minutes by 15.
```csharp Boolean isAvailable = scheduleObject.RawSchedule[2, 15, (Int32)50/15]; ```

summary.span: 將整個排程重設為無法使用。

span.span: Resets the entire schedule to unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetDailySchedule (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay fromHour, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour fromMinute, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay toHour, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour toMinute);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetDailySchedule(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay fromHour, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour fromMinute, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.HourOfDay toHour, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.MinuteOfHour toMinute) cil managed
Public Sub SetDailySchedule (fromHour As HourOfDay, fromMinute As MinuteOfHour, toHour As HourOfDay, toMinute As MinuteOfHour)

public: void SetDailySchedule(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::HourOfDay fromHour, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::MinuteOfHour fromMinute, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::HourOfDay toHour, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::MinuteOfHour toMinute);

param.name: fromHour
param.span: 的其中一個成員，指定來源可供複寫的第一個小時。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the first hour that the source will be available for replication.

param.name: fromMinute
param.span: 的其中一個成員，指定來源可供複寫的第一個 15 分鐘間隔。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the first 15-minute interval that the source will be available for replication.

param.name: toHour
param.span: 的其中一個成員，指定來源可供複寫的最後一個小時。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the final hour that the source will be available for replication.

param.name: toMinute
param.span: 的其中一個成員，指定來源可供複寫的最後一個 15 分鐘間隔。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the final 15-minute interval that the source will be available for replication.

summary.span: 將一星期中每一天的一段時間加入排程中。

span.span: Adds a range of times for every day of the week to the schedule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有在這個方法的參數都包含在內。All of the parameters in this method are inclusive. 這個方法是累計的而且不會移除任何現有的排程資訊。This method is cumulative and does not remove any existing schedule information. 如果現有的排程與新的排程重疊，則仍會累計。If an existing schedule and the new schedule overlap, the result will still be cumulative. 若要清除排程，請使用方法。To clear the schedule, use the method.

summary.span: 將某段時間加入排程中。

span.span: Adds a range of times to the schedule.

summary.span: 將一天的某段時間加入排程中。

span.span: Adds a range of times for a single day to the schedule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有在這個方法的參數都包含在內。All of the parameters in this method are inclusive. 這個方法是累計的而且不會移除任何現有的排程資訊。This method is cumulative and does not remove any existing schedule information. 如果現有的排程與新的排程重疊，則仍會累計。If an existing schedule and the new schedule overlap, the result will still be cumulative. 若要清除排程，請使用方法。To clear the schedule, use the method.

exception.span: 開始時間在結束時間之後。

span.span: The start time is after the end time.
